Learned High Court Judge of Chilaw on the refusal to allow the defense to
send the document marked P1 by the prosecution for examination by the
Examiner of Questioned Documents.
The  position  of  the  petitioner  is  that  the  prosecution  has  charged  the

marked a document marked as P1 which is supposed to have been drafted
